content.name: Flower Dance

Time to go home..."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
content.Abigail: I really hate dancing in front of everyone... It's so embarrassing.#$e#Mom makes me do it.$u
content.Robin: Ahh... The air smells so sweet with all these flowers.$h
content.Demetrius: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals.#$e#Hey... You should know about this stuff, farmer.
content.Maru: I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old timers really love it, though.
content.Linus: Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.#$b#Spring is almost over... what a shame.
content.Pierre: What! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Don't touch anything.
content.Caroline: I wish Pierre would spend this time with the family...$s
content.Alex: I'm just enjoying the scenery... hehe.
content.George: Flowers? I can hardly see them.#$e#It's too bright out here!
content.Evelyn: I've been working on these floral arrangements for a week. Do you like them?
content.Lewis: If you'd like to dance with the other young people, you'll need to find a partner.
content.Clint: I wonder if Emily would dance with me?
content.Pam: Now this is the life... Huh, kid? Sweet wine, a babbling brook, warm air... Did I mention wine?
content.Emily: Whoo... I'm stuffed. Hey, have you tried the red jelly yet?
content.Haley: I'm practicing my dance moves... It needs to be perfect.#$e#I've been flower queen for the past 5 years and I'm not ready to step off the throne just yet!
content.Jodi: Are you going to be dancing today, @?$h
content.Kent: This open field... it makes me nervous.#$e#*whisper* Happy thoughts, Kent. Happy Thoughts.
content.Sam: You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers!
content.Leah: Hi @. Glad to see you here.$h
content.Shane: Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*#$e#Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch*#$b#*crunch* ...ow.$s
content.Marnie: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single.$s
content.Elliott: I wore my best shirt for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!
content.Gus: Frog season is really starting to pick up.
content.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
content.Harvey: I'm working up the courage to ask someone to dance with me.$11
content.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
content.Jas: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen!
content.Vincent: That's not fair... Why can't I be the flower queen?
content.Willy: I should've brought my fishing pole.
content.Leo: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colorful as back home!$h#$e#I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance...$u
